**********
Known Bugs
**********

Below is a list of known general bugs.  There may also be additional bugs
listed in the `issue tracker
<http://bitbucket.org/everyapp/bootstrap/issues>`_.

.. bugs_start

* Commands and/or paths in |bootstrap.cfg| that contain spaces, even if quoted,
  could cause |bootstrap.py| to blow up.  This needs to be tested/fixed for
  both Linux and Windows.
* Python_ 3.x is not yet supported.
